mapper.insert: insert ignore into success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) values ({#seckillId},#{userPhone})
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as seckill "seckill_start_time" , s.end_time as "seckill_end_time" s.create_timeas as "seckill_create" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
